channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: We are doomed. @lasersailor @stevesi @mims https://t.co/58mGSlN14P
item.source:markdown: We are doomed. @lasersailor @stevesi @mims https://t.co/58mGSlN14P

item.description:
Data point: one Apple store sees almost 2:1 iPhone SE (current gen) sales vs. other models. Price is overwhelmingly important to walk-in buyers.

Google will sell a lot of Pixel 6a for the same reason. It is missing Qi charging but is otherwise a superior low cost GOOD phone.
item.source:markdown:
Data point: one Apple store sees almost 2:1 iPhone SE (current gen) sales vs. other models. Price is overwhelmingly important to walk-in buyers.
Google will sell a lot of Pixel 6a for the same reason. It is missing Qi charging but is otherwise a superior low cost GOOD phone.

item.description: @growmilkweed Serious Q: have been soaking Asclepias curassavica (tropical milkweed) seeds for a while but no hint of germination. Daytime temps have been in 70s now 80s. Shall I just plant them? Pretty sure the seed is ok.
item.source:markdown: @growmilkweed Serious Q: have been soaking Asclepias curassavica (tropical milkweed) seeds for a while but no hint of germination. Daytime temps have been in 70s now 80s. Shall I just plant them? Pretty sure the seed is ok.

item.description:
@russsharer Understood. It's a free country.

I hope you get an invite so you taste the output of that incredible grill. Ideally, a double blind test against a $99 Weber.

@russsharer Understood. It's a free country.

item.description: YES! Problem solved. https://t.co/mf2O66hSsg
item.source:markdown: YES! Problem solved. https://t.co/mf2O66hSsg

item.description: Solid (if critical) overview of Mastodon, a decentralized social network. It has promise, but also significant frustrations. The biggest downside: Mastodon's user base is TINY compared with Twitter or Facebook. If you care, I'm @ronkjeffries@mastodon.social hat tip: @davewiner
item.source:markdown: Solid (if critical) overview of Mastodon, a decentralized social network. It has promise, but also significant frustrations. The biggest downside: Mastodon's user base is TINY compared with Twitter or Facebook. If you care, I'm @ronkjeffries@mastodon.social hat tip: @davewiner

item.description: Reposting this because apparently nobody has seen it.;) Are you OK with idea of a $3800 BBQ on sale at a neighborhood hardware store in a not-very-affluent town (Nipomo, CA) because I don't understand. https://t.co/xzY8rulioj

item.description:
I am looking for a solid (no drama) explanation of what this development may mean. Developing leading edge silicon is a hard problem. Maybe the in-house effort at Meta was moving too slowly?

@lasersailor @MikyDe @russsharer
item.source:markdown:
I am looking for a solid (no drama) explanation of what this development may mean. Developing leading edge silicon is a hard problem. Maybe the in-house effort at Meta was moving too slowly?
